name: broccoli-example
description: [Broccoli](https://github.com/broccolijs/broccoli) is a node-based "beta" quality pipeline. [broccoli-asset-rev](https://www.npmjs.com/package/broccoli-asset-rev) implements hashing/versioning, and also can spit out manifests in a range of formats. "Rails-style" (ie Sprockets) manifest:
author: James Aylett
